data.title: Times of India Entertainment
data.meta_description: issa rae News: Check out the latest news about issa rae along with issa rae movies, issa rae photos, issa rae videos and more on Times of India Entertainment.
data.text:
issa rae opens up about the nightmare of filming 'Dance the Night' in a Barbie

etimes.in / Jan 20, 2024, 13:09 (IST)

The track "Dance the Night" plays in the early scenes of Barbie, where Margot Robbie's Barbie hosts a party at her residence. Rae's character, President Barbie, participates in the dance alongside various Barbies, Kens, and other characters. Rae highlighted that the production filmed the intricate dance sequence before the song "Dance the Night" was fully completed

Who is issa rae's husband? All about Louis Diame

etimes.in / Jan 18, 2024, 09:41 (IST)

issa rae and her husband, Louis Diame, are a private couple. Rae values her personal life and prefers to keep it out of the public eye. They got engaged in 2019 and tied the knot in July 2021 in France.

Oscars 2020 Nominations: Here’s the complete list of nominees for the 92nd Academy Awards

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Jan 13, 2020, 19:37 (IST)

The nominations for the much-awaited award function of the year is here! It's time to see the list of films, actors, actresses and more who are chosen for the prestigious 92nd Academy Awards. The year 2019 has seen great content across categories and hence it will going to be difficult to pick one for any of the sections. Actor-producer John Cho and actor-writer-producer issa rae will host a live presentation to declare nominations of Oscars 2020.

Critics Choice Awards 2024: Margot Robbie's 'Barbie' wins Best Comedy, Best Original Screenplay

ANI / Jan 15, 2024, 13:45 (IST)

At the Critics Choice Awards 2024, Margot Robbie's fantasy comedy film 'Barbie' clinched the titles of Best Comedy and Best Original Screenplay. The movie, directed by Greta Gerwig, also secured awards for Best Costume Design and Best Production Design. With a record-breaking 18 nominations, 'Barbie' surpassed achievements of films like 'Everything Everywhere All at Once' and 'The Shape of Water.' Christopher Nolan's 'Oppenheimer' and Yorgos Lanthimos' 'Poor Things' received 13 nominations each. Despite mixed reviews, 'Barbie' emerged as one of the highest-grossing films of 2023, facing a box office clash with Christopher Nolan's 'Oppenheimer.' A historic feat was achieved as 'Barbie' and director Greta Gerwig surpassed $1 billion in global box office gross, marking the first instance of a movie directed solely by a woman reaching this milestone. The film features Margot Robbie and Ryan Gosling in lead roles and explores a quest for self-discovery in the real world beyond Barbieland.

America Ferrera credits Latina identity for securing role in Barbie movie

etimes.in / Jan 01, 2024, 13:59 (IST)

Ferrera emphasized that while the role was written as Latina, being Latina was not the character's sole purpose. Gloria was portrayed as a full-fledged human, representing various aspects beyond her ethnicity, challenging traditional "check the box" casting practices. Ferrera appreciates that this marked a positive shift in the industry for her. Earlier, Ferrera had shared with ComicBook.com that she was pleased to play Gloria in Barbie, as it was the part she would have chosen

It’s official! Margot Robbie’s ‘Barbie’ locks its digital release date

etimes.in / Dec 09, 2023, 10:46 (IST)

Margot Robbie's 'Barbie' will have its digital premiere on JioCinema on December 21. The film, based on the dolls by Mattel, is the first live-action Barbie film and features Robbie in the lead role. The fantasy comedy, helmed by Greta Gerwig and scripted by Noah Baumbach, follows Barbie and Ken on a journey of self-discovery. 'Barbie' was a blockbuster at the box office, becoming Warner Bros.' biggest movie ever globally and surpassing 'Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows — Part 2'.

Margot Robbie discloses ‘Oppenheimer’ producer's request to adjust ‘Barbie’ release date

etimes.in / Dec 06, 2023, 17:43 (IST)

Margot Robbie, the star and producer of 'Barbie,' discussed a clash between 'Barbie' and 'Oppenheimer' at the 2023 box office. Chuck Roven, a producer on 'Oppenheimer,' advised Robbie to change the release date, but both Robbie and the 'Oppenheimer' producer were firm in their decision. Murphy commended Robbie for her resolute stance. Robbie also revealed her conflicted feelings about a potential 'Barbie' sequel. 'Barbie,' directed by Greta Gerwig and featuring a star-studded cast including Ryan Gosling, issa rae, and Kate McKinnon, clashed with Christopher Nolan's 'Oppenheimer,' a biopic about J.

Margot Robbie's 'Barbie' to make OTT debut on December 21

etimes.in / Dec 09, 2023, 12:16 (IST)

Margot Robbie's film 'Barbie' achieves significant success and makes its streaming debut on December 21 exclusively on JioCinema in English and Hindi. Directed by Greta Gerwig, 'Barbie' is a fantasy comedy film that brings to life the iconic dolls created by Mattel. The film promises a unique and captivating experience with a blend of fantasy, humor, and introspection. The stellar cast includes Margot Robbie, Ryan Gosling, America Ferrera, Kate McKinnon, issa rae, Rhea Perlman, and Will Ferrell.

Metallic-shimmer trend dominated the red carpet at the Golden Globes 2024

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Jan 08, 2024, 19:00 (IST)

The Golden Globes Award 2024 was a star-studded event with celebrities achieving the metallic trend which remained the highlight of the event. From Emma Stone to Julia Garner, stars were seen carrying the metallic-shimmer trend too gracefully, which looked regal with the backdrop of the event.

Shah Rukh Khan and Deepika Padukone had a Barbie moment in 'Om Shanti Om' - WATCH viral video

etimes.in / Jul 24, 2023, 16:22 (IST)

A video of Shah Rukh Khan and Deepika Padukone from their movie, 'Om Shanti Om', has gone viral on social media. In the video, they play badminton on a pink court, with Deepika's group referred to as the Barbies and Shah Rukh's group as the Kens. This video came amidst the 'Barbie' buzz created by Greta Gerwig's movie, which has become a box office hit.

Shahid Kapoor's wife Mira Rajput takes a dig at Margot Robbie's 'Barbie': 'Hollywood can’t do song-and-dance like Bollywood can' - See post

etimes.in / Jul 25, 2023, 11:17 (IST)

Shahid Kapoor's wife Mira Rajput took to her Instagram stories to share a still from the film Barbie and wrote, "Hollywood can't do song-and-dance like Bollywood can." Barbie, directed by Greta Gerwig, has become the highest-grossing movie for a female director. A video of Shah Rukh Khan and Deepika Padukone playing badminton on a pink court from their movie Om Shanti Om had earlier gone viral and received positive comments.

Meghan Markle parties at Beyoncé’s concert, this time sans Prince Harry

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Sep 06, 2023, 19:42 (IST)

Meghan Markle had a fun night out with her celebrity friends at Beyoncé's concert in Los Angeles. The Suits star and Duchess of Sussex attended the final show of Beyoncé's Renaissance world tour at SoFi Stadium. Meghan was seen posing with Kelly Rowland and Kerry Washington, all dressed in black with silver accessories as per Beyoncé's birthday wish. This is not the first time Meghan and Beyoncé have crossed paths, as they met at the London premiere of The Lion King in 2019.

Greta Gerwig makes box office history with 'Barbie'; records BIGGEST opening for female director

TNN & Agencies / Jul 24, 2023, 07:57 (IST)

Greta Gerwig's 'Barbie' has taken over as the biggest box-office debut in the US and worldwide by a solo-woman director, raking in $337 million at the global box office. The film's collections surpass the collections made by the Anna Boden directed 'Captain Marvel' and Patty Jenkins' 'Wonder Woman'. 'Barbie' also set a new record for the biggest opening weekend of the year at the box office.
